name: Lyney
storytext: Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?
source: Reward for inviting Lyney to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Prop Arrow
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], summons a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113101]</color>, and gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color>.\nIf this character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 $[K5] to themself.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, summons a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Grin-Malkin Hat</color>, and gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prop Surplus</color>.\nIf this character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to themself.
skills.description:
Deals 2 Pyro DMG, summons a Grin-Malkin Hat, and gains 1 stack of Prop Surplus.
If this character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 Piercing DMG to themself.

skills.name: Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade

skills.description: Deals 3 Pyro DMG, summons 1 Grin-Malkin Hat, and gains 1 stack of Prop Surplus.
